description:
Race through multiple distinct, zany tracks to the tune of bopping meowsic designed by cats for cats. Choose between five adorable half-cat-half-combat fully armed vehicles but don’t let them fool you - as all cats, they’re as deadly as they are cute and fluffy. Each of the cat-hicles pawsesses its own catty weapons so use them to your advantage. Gather power-ups, outsmart the competition, and become victorious!

▪ Get your zoom on - Race on 4 quirky, cartoony tracks
▪ Cats galore - Choose from 5 adorable kitty machines
▪ Bring me toys! - Collect plethora of game-changing power-ups
▪ Race, fight, dodge, leave your friends in the dust, and win!
name: Supersonic Tank Cats
intro: Put down the catnip and remove the distractions (like that clock on the counter that’s taunting you) and grab a controller cause it’s time to drive one of the wacky Supersonic Tank Cats.
